accessories.Name: Bridle Mirror (Round)
accessories.Body:
Our Bridle (Round) Mirror is handcrafted in natural English oak, with bridle jointed circular detail. This simple and versatile piece works beautifully in almost every space.

Available in various sizes and timbers.

Made to order: 10-12 weeks
This items is made to order in our standard lead-time, if you need an expedient service please get in touch: 01482 679862

Shipping guide
UK for £32

Dimensions
ø900 x 35d mm

Bespoke

accessories.Name: Furniture Care Kit
accessories.Body:
Our furniture care kit contains everything you'll need to care for your Galvin Brothers furniture and maintain your wood's natural beauty. 

Ideal for you to keep your furniture looking at its best because it contains all of the kit that you'll need to prepare, sand and re-oil all timber surfaces. Perfect for restoring timber lustre; spot repairing small dents and scratches; and to help you replenish and build up the protective surface oils.

In-stock item: dispatched in 1–2 days

Contents: white lint free cloth; fine and medium sand paper; fine and medium abrasive pads; hardwax oil; general care instructions

accessories.Name: Draftsman's Roll
accessories.Body:
The Galvin Brothers Draftsman's Roll is based on the archetypal carpenter's chisel roll, designed in this case to stow and carry pencils, scribes and drawing implements. 

Ideal for those illustrator types, the budding weekend watercolorist, or the designer maker with a handful of blunt pencils and leaking pens.  

In-stock item: dispatched 1-2 days

Fabric: 100% cotton Japanese selvedge denim 14.5oz

Sizes: 400w x 260h mm (flat) 
Slots ranging 25mm up to 60mm

accessories.Name: To The Sea — Lo Scented Candle
accessories.Body:
The ocean is a mystery that sometimes makes scents. Its bluey breeze bends and morphs and gently rocks, a coastal groove that won’t sit still...

We think these candles from Lo are the best. Hand poured in small batches for freshness. The scents are amazing and the packaging exquisite.

To The Sea is Rock Salt, Bergamot, Musk Mallow and Samphire. 100% natural with a burn time of 60 hours.

In-stock item: dispatched in 1–2 days

Shipping guide: UK for £4.95

Product details:
Rock Salt, Bergamot, Musk Mallow and Samphire
Up to 60 Hours Burn Time
Natural Wax Blend 
220g

accessories.Name: Bergamot Clouds — Lo Scented Candle
accessories.Body:
I laid on my side on a bergamot cloud. Yawned then sipped from a cup brushed by Dali...

We think these candles from Lo are the best. Hand poured in small batches for freshness. The scents are amazing and the packaging exquisite.

Bergamot Clouds is Bergamot, Sandalwood, Violet, Patchouli and Incense. 100% natural with a burn time of 60 hours.

In-stock item: dispatched in 1–2 days

Shipping guide: UK for £4.95

Product details:
Bergamot Clouds is Bergamot, Sandalwood, Violet, Patchouli and Incense
Up to 60 Hours Burn Time
Natural Wax Blend 
220g

accessories.Name: Pathless Wood — Lo Scented Candle
accessories.Body:
Natural beauty’s key is its simpleness. The senses in the woods get electric because there’s nothing else there...

We think these candles from Lo are the best. Hand poured in small batches for freshness. The scents are amazing and the packaging exquisite.

Pathless Wood is Cedarwood, Oak Moss, Amber and Bergamot. 100% natural with a burn time of 60 hours.

In-stock item: dispatched in 1–2 days

Shipping guide: UK for £4.95

Product details:
Cedarwood, Oak Moss, Amber and Bergamot
Up to 60 Hours Burn Time
Natural Wax Blend 
220g

accessories.Name: Unkempt Geisha — Lo Scented Candle
accessories.Body:
The notion of the Geisha will feel lighter in the future. She will not bow so low, and aim much higher...

We think these candles from Lo are the best. Hand poured in small batches for freshness. The scents are amazing and the packaging exquisite.

Unkempt Geisha is Orchid, Pink Pepper, Vetiver and Geranium. 100% natural with a burn time of 60 hours.

In-stock item: dispatched in 1–2 days

Shipping guide: UK for £4.95

Product details:
Orchid, Pink Pepper, Vetiver & Geranium
Up to 60 Hours Burn Time
Natural Wax Blend 
220g

sideboards-cabinets.Name: Peninsula Bedside Table
sideboards-cabinets.Body:
The Peninsula Bedside table is an elegant cabinet, defined by a spindled section and clean straight lines. The drawer unit is 'handed' with spindles on the left or right hand side to sit on opposing sides of the bed (or ends of a sofa). Available in a range of timbers and including a suede lined drawer.

Made to order: 10-12 weeks
This items is made to order in our standard lead-time, if you need an expedient service please get in touch: 01482 679862

Shipping guide
UK for £32

Dimensions 600w x 410d x 550h mm

Bespoke
We work closely with the trade to develop bespoke variations for exclusive commissions for commercial interiors, art projects and larger schemes. Contact us to discuss a project:
01482 679862

sideboards-cabinets.Name: Fluted Bedside Cabinet
sideboards-cabinets.Body:
The Fluted Bedside Cabinet is made from solid timber. A single fluted cabinet door with internal adjustable shelf. Available in natural English Oak with an optional white door, or dark American Black Walnut. 

This cabinet is 'handed' with doors hung on opposing sides for the left and right hand side of the bed.

Made to order: 10-12 weeks
This items is made to order in our standard lead-time, if you need an expedient service please get in touch: 01482 679862

Shipping guide
UK for £48

Dimensions 405w x 400d x 600h mm

Customise
This piece is made to order which allows us to give some ﬂexibilty to you if you need to specify alternative dimensions or a different timber/ finish. We work closely with the trade to develop bespoke and exclusive commissions for larger schemes.

sideboards-cabinets.Name: Bobbin Sideboard

stools-seating.Name: Bastion Stool
stools-seating.Body:
Our new Bastion Stool is made from very carefully laminated timber staves, that are then turned into a gently tapering volume. Finished with a super-soft ‘Sahara’ leather cushion seat. 

This piece was commissioned as part of the Blackwood Collection, a luxury holiday home nestled in secluded woodland in West Runton, Norfolk.

Made to order: 10-12 weeks This items is made to order in our standard lead-time, if you need an expedient service please get in touch: 01482 679862

stools-seating.Name: Cutler's Stool
stools-seating.Body:
Our Cutler's Stool is a modern interpretation of an old workshop archetype, designed in collaboration with Corin Mellor from David Mellor Design.

Sticking with the spirit of the original this piece is never 'over-finished' — so the saw tooth and the swipe of a draw knife are left as echoes of the method of manufacture — creating a rustic and idiosyncratic seat with the same quirks as its predecessor. 

Made to order: 10-12 weeks Shop stock sometimes available. If you need an expedient service please get in touch: 01482 679862

Shipping guide: UK for £21

Bespoke: We work closely with the trade to develop bespoke variations for exclusive commissions for commercial interiors, art projects and larger schemes.

stools-seating.Body:

stools-seating.Name: Passing Colour Stool
stools-seating.Body:

The Passing Colour Stool is a limited edition piece available in two colour options.

Our signature bar height stool with upholstered cushion top. Made in solid oak or walnut. Available in two heights for counter top and bar top options. See also our three legged variation.

Made to order: 10-12 weeks This items is made to order in our standard lead-time, if you need an expedient service please get in touch: 01482 679862

Shipping guide UK for £32

Dimensions 
ø320 x 650h mm 
ø320 x 750h mm

stools-seating.Name: Signature Bench
stools-seating.Body:
Our Signature Bench is a modern archetype; traditional joinery in an economical form. Super stable, super robust and deceptively comfortable. Available in a range of lengths in both natural and ebonised oak, ash and walnut. See also our Signature (Cushion) Bench and Signature (Backrest) Bench.

Made to order: 10-12 weeks This items is made to order in our standard lead-time, if you need an expedient service please get in touch: 01482 679862

Dimensions  1200–2000w x 300d x 460h mm

Shipping guide: UK for £59

Customise This piece is made to order  which allows us to give some ﬂexibilty  to you if you need to specify  alternative dimensions or a different  timber/ ﬁnish. We can also cover our upholstered pieces in alternative fabrics.  We work closely with the trade to develop  bespoke and exclusive commissions for  larger schemes. Please contact us to  discuss options: 01482 679862

Made to order: 10-12 weeks This items is made to order in our standard lead-time, if you need an expedient service please get in touch: 01482 679862

Dimensions  1200–2000w x 300d x 460h mm

Shipping guide: UK for £59

Customise This piece is made to order  which allows us to give some ﬂexibilty  to you if you need to specify  alternative dimensions or a different  timber/ ﬁnish. We can also cover our upholstered pieces in alternative fabrics.  We work closely with the trade to develop  bespoke and exclusive commissions for  larger schemes. Please contact us to  discuss options: 01482 679862

Available in a range of lengths in both natural and ebonised oak. See also our standard Signature Bench and Signature (Backrest) Bench.

Made to order: 10-12 weeks This items is made to order in our standard lead-time, if you need an expedient service please get in touch: 01482 679862

Dimensions  1200–2000w x 340d x 460h mm

Shipping guide: UK for £59

Customise This piece is made to order  which allows us to give some ﬂexibilty  to you if you need to specify  alternative dimensions or a different  timber/ ﬁnish. We can also cover our upholstered pieces in alternative fabrics.  We work closely with the trade to develop  bespoke and exclusive commissions for  larger schemes. Please contact us to  discuss options: 01482 679862

tables-desks.Body:
Our Bobbin Shelving is a new and versatile addition to our range. It makes for a great side table, a neat drinks stand for cocktails and whiskey, a compact bedside and with a second teir becomes a tidy stand or corner shelving. Available as standard in natural oak with options for alternative coloured bobbin stays and finished with custom machined brass fixings.

tables-desks.Name: Bobbin Side Table
tables-desks.Body:
Our Bobbin Side Table has a turned pedestal that mimics the ornate hand-carved features of 17th Century, English and Dutch, 'spool-turned' furniture. The counterpoint to this elaborate wood turning is a very simple structural form designed for functionality. Our aim for this piece is a gesture of 'warm modernism'.

Made to order: 10-12 weeks This items is made to order in our standard lead-time, if you need an expedient service please get in touch: 01482 679862

Our (Imperfect) Pedestal is a solid hand turned post with three top-heavy beads that create a distinct silhouette. Available in three standard sizes, in natural oak, ebonies oak or a combination. Bespoke larger sizes can also be made. 

Made to order: 10-12 weeks
This items is made to order in our standard lead-time, if you need an expedient service please get in touch: 01482 679862

Shipping guide
UK for £79

Dimensions: 
ø800 x 740h mm (seating 2+)
ø1000 x 740h mm (seating 4)
ø1200 x 740h mm (seating 4+)

Customise
This piece is made to order which allows us to give some ﬂexibilty to you if you need to specify alternative dimensions or a different timber/ finish. We work closely with the trade to develop bespoke and exclusive commissions for larger schemes. 
Please contact us to  discuss options:
01482 679862

tables-desks.Body:

Made to order: 10-12 weeks
This items is made to order in our standard lead-time, if you need an expedient service please get in touch: 01482 679862

tables-desks.Name: Polygon Pedestal Dining Table
tables-desks.Body:
The Polygon pedestal is a careful jointed, gently tapering dodecagon. Made in quarter sawn solid oak, or walnut as an option, the table top is a beautifully poised disc of timber. Available in four standard sizes, with bespoke large options also possible. 

Made to order: 12-14 weeks
This items is made to order in our standard lead-time, if you need an expedient service please get in touch: 01482 679862

Shipping guide
UK for £79

Dimensions: 
ø1000 x 740h mm (seating 4)
ø1200 x 740h mm (seating 4-5)
ø1600 x 740h mm (seating 6-8)

tables-desks.Name: Peninsula Ash Dining Table
tables-desks.Body:
Our new Peninsula Dining Table is a bold yet simple celebration of beautiful Brocklesby Ash, designed in collaboration with Studio Ashby as a special commission for the Peninsula Collection. 

The undercarriage incorporates traditional bridle and half lap joints making for a robust but uncluttered pedestal which works amazingly well for a vast array of seating options and arrangements; making the most of the space. 

Materials: Ash / Olive Ash (also available in oak) Please contact us to discuss bespoke options in length and width — with 3m+ options available.

Finish: Hardwax Oil

Dimensions: W800 x H740 x L2400+ mm

tables-desks.Name: Capsule Ingot Dining Table
tables-desks.Body:
Our Capsule Ingot Dining Table is a 'capsule' shaped slab of solid timber in conjunction with two robust and voluminous 'ingot' pedestals. It is in some ways a rudimentary form that projects confidence and authority despite its simplicity. Shown here is the spectacularly fluid English Elm variation.

Made to order: 10-12 weeks
This items is made to order in our standard lead-time, if you need an expedient service please get in touch: 01482 679862

Shipping guide
UK for £170

Dimensions: 
L1800 x W800 x H740 mm (seating 6-8)
L2400 x W800 x H740 mm (seating 8-10)
L2800 x W900 x H740 mm (seating 10-12)

Customise
This piece is made to order which allows us to give some ﬂexibilty to you if you need to specify alternative dimensions or a different timber/ finish. We work closely with the trade to develop bespoke and exclusive commissions for larger schemes.

tables-desks.Body:

tables-desks.Name: Deep North (Waney) Tables
tables-desks.Body:
Waney edge (or live edge) tables are central to our bespoke offer. The aim with our waney edged work is to allow the raw natural beauty of characterful timbers to do the talking.

Each table is unique — we carefully select the most appropriate boards from a varying range of British and European timbers; slow growing, carefully seasoned, full of figure, rich in colour and exceptional quality. We think it's about the right timber in the right context. 

Made to order: 12-14 weeks
If you require an expedient service please get in touch: +44 (0)1482 679862

Shipping guide
Specialist handling and installation.

Bespoke
This piece is made entirely to order with a design service to which includes concept development. We work closely with domestic and trade customers to develop unique and exclusive commissions for large and small projects.

Materials: Most of our timbers are British timbers, they include: English Ash, Olive Ash, English and European Oak, English Walnut, French Walnut, Elm, Ebonised Oak, Pippy Oak, Tiger Oak, Beech, Chestnut

Dimensions: All dimensions are bespoke, starting from small pedestal and hall tables at 1000 mm up to long banquet and boardroom tables at 7000+ mm. Give us a call to discuss your project: +44 (0)1482 679862

tables-desks.Name: Bastion Dining Table
tables-desks.Body:
The Bastion Dining Table is a soft capsule shape — gentle and inviting — carefully detailed with a full radius edge, creating a beautifully poised top which sits on heavy set column legs.

Commissioned as part of a special collection for Blackwood, Norfolk; a luxury holiday home nestled in secluded woodland in West Runton, Norfolk.

Made to order: 10-12 weeks
This items is made to order in our standard lead-time, if you need an expedient service please get in touch: 01482 679862

tables-desks.Name: Waney Edge Ingot Tables
tables-desks.Body:
Our Waney Edge Ingot Table celebrates slow-grown, natural charm through these beautiful British and European timbers. The piece pictured here is English Elm. The waney or ‘live’ edge table top, is supported by a sturdy ingot base; clean lines meet raw, natural beauty.

Each piece is unique and made to order. We carefully select the most appropriate boards from a varying range of British and European timbers; slow growing, carefully seasoned, full of figure, rich in colour and exceptional quality. We think it's about the right timber in the right context.

Made to order: 12-14 weeks
If you require an expedient service please get in touch: +44 (0)1482 679862

Shipping guide
Specialist handling and installation.

Bespoke
This piece is made entirely to order with a design service to which includes concept development. We work closely with domestic and trade customers to develop unique and exclusive commissions for large and small projects.

Materials: Most of our timbers are British timbers, they include: English Ash, Olive Ash, English and European Oak, English Walnut, French Walnut, Elm, Ebonised Oak, Pippy Oak, Tiger Oak, Beech, Chestnut

Dimensions: All dimensions are bespoke, starting from small pedestal and hall tables at 1000 mm up to long banquet and boardroom tables at 7000+ mm. Give us a call to discuss your project: +44 (0)1482 679862

If you require an expedient service please get in touch: +44 (0)1482 679862

Shipping guide
Specialist handling and installation.

Bespoke
This piece is made entirely to order with a design service to which includes concept development. We work closely with domestic and trade customers to develop unique and exclusive commissions for large and small projects.

Materials: Most of our timbers are British timbers, they include: English Ash, Olive Ash, English and European Oak, English Walnut, French Walnut, Elm, Ebonised Oak, Pippy Oak, Tiger Oak, Beech, Chestnut

Dimensions: All dimensions are bespoke, starting from small pedestal and hall tables at 1000 mm up to long banquet and boardroom tables at 7000+ mm. Give us a call to discuss your project: +44 (0)1482 679862

tables-desks.Name: Buronzu (Comb) Dining Table
tables-desks.Body:
Our Buronzu (Comb) Dining Table combines naturally characterful timbers — deep in time and rich with striated grain — with an opulent brass comb pedestal base.

Each piece is unique and made to order. We carefully select the most appropriate boards from a varying range of British and European timbers; slow growing, carefully seasoned, full of figure, rich in colour and exceptional quality. 

Also available with a solid timber combs, polished brass or patinated brass (shown here).

Made to order: 12-14 weeks
If you require an expedient service please get in touch: +44 (0)1482 679862

Shipping guide
Specialist handling and installation.

Bespoke
This piece is made entirely to order with a design service to which includes concept development. We work closely with domestic and trade customers to develop unique and exclusive commissions for large and small projects.

Materials: Most of our timbers are British timbers, they include: English Ash, Olive Ash, English and European Oak, English Walnut, French Walnut, Elm, Ebonised Oak, Pippy Oak, Tiger Oak, Beech, Chestnut

Dimensions: All dimensions are bespoke, starting from small pedestal and hall tables at 1000 mm up to long banquet and boardroom tables at 7000+ mm. Give us a call to discuss your project: +44 (0)1482 679862

tables-desks.Name: Bobbin Console Table
tables-desks.Body:
The Bobbin Console table incorporates the rhythm of our interpretation of the 17th Century English and Dutch spool or bobbin furniture. Upright and avoiding any laziness in the turning. This console table has a suede lined drawer in the front rail.

Made to order: 10-12 weeks
This items is made to order in our standard lead-time, if you need an expedient service please get in touch: 01482 679862

Shipping guide
UK for £140

Dimensions: 
1000w x 400d x 740h mm
1200w x 400d x 740h mm
1400w x 400d x 740h mm

tables-desks.Name: Peninsula Dressing Table
tables-desks.Body:
The Peninsula Dressing Table is carefully made with an inlayed leather top, suede lined drawer and gently curved mirror. An addition to our Peninsula Collection that is defined by square joinery and neat half-lap and bridal joints. Available in natural English Oak, dark Walnut or English Ash (shown here) with a combination of leathers.

tables-desks.Name: Peninsula Bedside Table
tables-desks.Body:
The Peninsula Bedside table is an elegant cabinet, defined by a spindled section and clean straight lines. The drawer unit is 'handed' with spindles on the left or right hand side to sit on opposing sides of the bed (or ends of a sofa). Available in a range of timbers and including a suede lined drawer.

Made to order: 10-12 weeks
This items is made to order in our standard lead-time, if you need an expedient service please get in touch: 01482 679862

tables-desks.Name: Bataillon in Bloom
tables-desks.Body:
Bataillon in Bloom is both table and vase.

Inspired by Hanakotoba the Japanese form of the language of flowers, a grid of drilled glass vessels provide the spaces for individual stems to be carefully arranged in a new kind of Floriography.

An intricate canopy of flowers sits above 176 hand-turned spindles; a space for a new Ikebana ("making flowers alive").

Dimensions 960w x 350d x 525h mm 

Bespoke options  
We work closely with the trade to develop  bespoke variations for exclusive commissions for commercial interiors, art projects and larger schemes.

Shipping Price excludes crating and shipping. Made to order with bespoke specification.

workshop-favourites.Variant Name: L800 x W500 x H400 mm Natural Oak
workshop-favourites.Body:
Our Waney Edge Coffee Table celebrates slow-grown, natural charm through these British timbers. Supported by a contrasting sturdy ingot base; clean lines meet raw, natural beauty.

Available in English Oak, Ebonised Oak, English Walnut and English Elm, in a range of sizes.

Our Waney Edge Coffee Table celebrates slow-grown, natural charm through these British timbers. Supported by a contrasting sturdy ingot base; clean lines meet raw, natural beauty.

Available in English Oak, Ebonised Oak, English Walnut and English Elm, in a range of sizes.

Made to order: 8-10 weeks
This items is made to order in our standard lead-time, if you need an expedient service please get in touch: 01482 679862

Shipping guide
UK for £59

L800 x D500 x H400 mm
L1000 x D600 x H400 mm

workshop-favourites.Name: Konig (Display) Cabinet
workshop-favourites.Body:
Our new Konig (Display) Cabinet is the 'king of cabinets' — opulent with it's glazed arches and sumptuous antique pink interior. The sideboard's sliding doors run on detailed brass runners and each compartment has a glass shelf. Bespoke options are possible with two and three door variations.

Made to order: 12-14 weeks
This items is made to order in our standard lead-time, if you need an expedient service please get in touch: 01482 679862

Shipping guide
UK for £79

Dimensions 2000w x 450d x 600h mm

Customise This piece is made to order which allows us to give some ﬂexibilty to you if you need to specify alternative dimensions or a different timber/ finish. We work closely with the trade to develop bespoke and exclusive commissions for larger schemes.

workshop-favourites.Name: Parted Chair
workshop-favourites.Body:
The Parted Chair is about inherent history and the passing of time. Stored in its structure is the lifetime of an English oak tree and the explicit time of the incremental parted cuts of its production.

Dimensions 400w x 400d x 830h mm (seat 460h mm)

Shipping guide Shipping in the UK for £48

Bespoke options We work closely with the trade to develop  bespoke variations for exclusive commissions, commercial interiors, art projects and larger schemes.

Made to order: 10-12 weeks This items is made to order in our standard lead-time, if you need an expedient service please get in touch: 01482 679862

workshop-favourites.Name: Bastion Dining Table
workshop-favourites.Body:
The Bastion Dining Table is a soft capsule shape — gentle and inviting — carefully detailed with a full radius edge, creating a beautifully poised top which sits on heavy set column legs.

Commissioned as part of a special collection for Blackwood, Norfolk; a luxury holiday home nestled in secluded woodland in West Runton, Norfolk.

Made to order: 10-12 weeks
This items is made to order in our standard lead-time, if you need an expedient service please get in touch: 01482 679862

UK for £170

workshop-favourites.Name: Bastion Stool
workshop-favourites.Body:
Our new Bastion Stool is made from very carefully laminated timber staves, that are then turned into a gently tapering volume. Finished with a super-soft ‘Sahara’ leather cushion seat. 

This piece was commissioned as part of the Blackwood Collection, a luxury holiday home nestled in secluded woodland in West Runton, Norfolk.

Made to order: 10-12 weeks This items is made to order in our standard lead-time, if you need an expedient service please get in touch: 01482 679862

Shipping guide UK for £24

Dimensions ø340 x 460h mm

Customise This piece is made to order which allows us to give some ﬂexibilty to you if you need to specify alternative dimensions or a different timber/ finish. We can also cover with customer own materials. We work closely with the trade to develop bespoke and exclusive commissions for larger schemes.

workshop-favourites.Name: Waney Edge Ingot Tables
workshop-favourites.Body:
Our Waney Edge Ingot Table celebrates slow-grown, natural charm through these beautiful British and European timbers. The piece pictured here is English Elm. The waney or ‘live’ edge table top, is supported by a sturdy ingot base; clean lines meet raw, natural beauty.

Each piece is unique and made to order. We carefully select the most appropriate boards from a varying range of British and European timbers; slow growing, carefully seasoned, full of figure, rich in colour and exceptional quality. We think it's about the right timber in the right context.

Made to order: 12-14 weeks
If you require an expedient service please get in touch: +44 (0)1482 679862

Shipping guide
Specialist handling and installation.

Bespoke
This piece is made entirely to order with a design service to which includes concept development. We work closely with domestic and trade customers to develop unique and exclusive commissions for large and small projects.

Materials: Most of our timbers are British timbers, they include: English Ash, Olive Ash, English and European Oak, English Walnut, French Walnut, Elm, Ebonised Oak, Pippy Oak, Tiger Oak, Beech, Chestnut

Dimensions: All dimensions are bespoke, starting from small pedestal and hall tables at 1000 mm up to long banquet and boardroom tables at 7000+ mm. Give us a call to discuss your project: +44 (0)1482 679862

workshop-favourites.Name: Parlour Stool
workshop-favourites.Body:
The Parlour Stool is an idiosyncratic variation on a traditional archetype. Two stretchers add some stiffness to the structure and create an asymmetric silhouette. Handmade in natural ebonised English Oak.

Made to order: 10-12 weeks This items is made to order in our standard lead-time, if you need an expedient service please get in touch: 01482 679862

workshop-favourites.Name: Buronzu (Comb) Dining Table
workshop-favourites.Body:
Our Buronzu (Comb) Dining Table combines naturally characterful timbers — deep in time and rich with striated grain — with an opulent brass comb pedestal base.

Each piece is unique and made to order. We carefully select the most appropriate boards from a varying range of British and European timbers; slow growing, carefully seasoned, full of figure, rich in colour and exceptional quality. 

Also available with a solid timber combs, polished brass or patinated brass (shown here).

Made to order: 12-14 weeks
If you require an expedient service please get in touch: +44 (0)1482 679862

Shipping guide
Specialist handling and installation.

Bespoke
This piece is made entirely to order with a design service to which includes concept development. We work closely with domestic and trade customers to develop unique and exclusive commissions for large and small projects.

Materials: Most of our timbers are British timbers, they include: English Ash, Olive Ash, English and European Oak, English Walnut, French Walnut, Elm, Ebonised Oak, Pippy Oak, Tiger Oak, Beech, Chestnut

Dimensions: All dimensions are bespoke, starting from small pedestal and hall tables at 1000 mm up to long banquet and boardroom tables at 7000+ mm. Give us a call to discuss your project: +44 (0)1482 679862

workshop-favourites.Name: Parted Block
workshop-favourites.Body:
The Parted Block is solid air-dried English Oak, in all of its natural, slow grown, unruly and organic glory. Our intervention is temporal; deliberate, quick-sharp, linear and incremental. Available in two sizes: tall with vertical partings, small with horizontal partings. Also available in our new 'twin tone' hand painted stained variation.

Made to order: 10-12 weeks This items is made to order in our standard lead-time, if you need an expedient service please get in touch: 01482 679862

Shipping guide UK for £32

Dimensions L220 x W220 x 405h mm
L220 x W220 x 495h mm
